item.title: Logout Message
item.dc:creator: @blitz_ags blitz ags
item.description:
@blitz_ags wrote:

How can i make the same thing as a login message but say “[players name] has logged out.” ??

Here my login one

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Divine Alex")) { yell("Owner And Coder, Divine Alex Has Logged In!"); } if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Phil")) { yell("Owner And Hoster, Phil Has Logged In!"); } if (playerRights == 0) { yell("[Player] "+playerName+" Has Logged In!"); } if (playerRights == 1) { yell("[Moderator] "+playerName+" Has Logged In!"); } if (playerRights == 2) { yell("[Administrator] "+playerName+" Has Logged In!"); } if (playerRights == 4) { yell("[Player] "+playerName+" Has Logged In!"); } if (donator == 1) { yell("[Donator] "+playerName+" Has Logged In!"); }

Read full topic
